options.text: "Lethal injection is by far the most cost-efficient and clean method of execution," suggests @@RANDOM_FEMALE_NAME@@, a wild-eyed and grey-haired military scientist who looks as if she hasn't slept in twenty years. "Also, if we're disposing of these worthless criminals, we may as well test out some of the more 'experimental' lethal chemicals that our R&D department is working on. They'll require some tweaking to get right, but these scumbags are dead men walking anyway, right?"
options.result: the government is denying reports that criminals injected with experimental drugs have turned into monstrous supervillains

options.text: "What's wrong with a good, old-fashioned hanging?" proposes @@RANDOM_NAME@@, a historical reenactor dressed in a period-accurate Disposable War infantry uniform. "We can hang the criminals in the town square, right in front of the watchful eyes of the public. We could even encourage fruits and vegetables to be thrown at 'em as they swing! Ah, it'll be a fine public spectacle, and a grand deterrent too!"
options.result: the tomato-covered corpses that decorate the nation's cities are a favourite amongst morbid tourists

policiesAndNotabilities.full: sometimes removes notability: punitive income tax rates
policiesAndNotabilities.name: punitive income tax rates

options.text: "You know, as much as we like to disavow less advanced cultures as 'primitive', I think they have some right ideas," comments big game hunter @@RANDOM_NAME@@, who recently returned from a safari in more savage lands. "I visited a tribe who execute troublemakers and the occasional sacrificial virgin by throwing them into an active volcano. They say it pleases the gods, and keeps disaster at bay. Sounds like a sensible plan to me."
options.result: voodoo economists believe that feeding criminals to volcanoes will bring untold riches to @@NAME@@

options.text: "How about a method that's fun for viewers, and gives criminals a chance to earn a pardon?" asks sleazy reality show producer @@RANDOM_NAME@@. "We could place the criminals on an island, each with a weapon, and tell them they have 24 hours to kill each other. The sole survivor would then win his or her freedom. We could broadcast this battle royale live, and the ratings would be through the roof!"
options.result: death row is annually emptied to feed the nation's hunger for televised murder-games

options.text: "Maybe we should aim to be as humane as possible when we take life?" asks butcher @@RANDOM_MALE_NAME@@, wiping his work knives clean on his apron. "We got bolt guns we use in the slaughterhouses. BAM. One bolt, one kill. Fast, effective, only a little messy." He looks down at a circle of splattered mess on the floor. "Is anyone else getting hungry talking about this?" [[color=blue]Must not be vegetarian[/color]]
options.result: blood stains the floors of the execution room and the hands of the state

options.text: "Maybe we should aim to be as humane as possible when we take life?" asks machine-tool specialist @@RANDOM_MALE_NAME@@, holding a claw hammer in each hand. "We got bolt guns that butchers used to use in the slaughterhouses, back before you put them out of work with those veggie-laws. BAM. One bolt, one kill. Fast, effective, only a little messy." He looks down at a circle of splattered mess on the floor. "Is anyone else getting hungry talking about this?" [[color=red]Must be vegetarian[/color]]
options.result: blood stains the floors of the execution room and the hands of the state

options.text: "Kill the death penalty!" chants activist @@RANDOM_NAME@@, bursting out of a hiding place in your stationery cupboard. "Cull government sanctioned murder! Destroy these needless acts of revenge violence! An eye for an eye makes the world go blind!" The intruder pokes your security guard in the peepers with a pencil, then flees the room.
options.result: international humanitarian organisations are applauding the government for ending the death penalty
